metadata.Title: CVE-2016-3920 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: id3/ID3.cpp in libstagefright in mediaserver in Android 5.0.x before 5.0.2,5.1.x before 5.1.1, 6.x before 2016-10-01, and 7.0 before 2016-10-01 allowsremote attackers to cause a denial of service (device hang or reboot) via acrafted file, aka internal bug 30744884.

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
